task: Search for a beginner-level online course about Python programming, suitable for someone who has no programming experience on Coursera.
user_action_and_explanation: type 'Python programming for beginners' into the search bar with the placeholder 'What do you want to learn?' to find suitable beginner-level courses.
observation: The search results display several beginner-level Python programming courses. Options include 'Python for Data Science, AI & Development' by IBM, 'AI Python for Beginners' by DeepLearning.AI, 'Python Programming Fundamentals' by Duke University, and 'Introduction to Scripting in Python' by Rice University, among others. These courses are labeled as beginner level and vary in duration, providing options suitable for someone with no prior programming experience.
